General.Name: Transcoal Pacific Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Transcoal Pacific Tbk, a shipping company, provides sea transportation and logistics services in Indonesia. It operates through Sea transportation business and Other Business Activities. The company primarily offers vessel charter and good freight services. It also provides barging, long hauling, transshipment, oil barge, and agency services, as well as mooring man and oil spill response team services. In addition, the company has a fleet of 137 tugs, 129 barges, 3 mother vessels, 2 floating cranes, and 5 sea trucks. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Transcoal Pacific Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sari Nusantara Gemilang.
General.Address: Bakrie Tower, Kompleks Rasuna Epicentrum, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12940
